name: Thorin Ironforge
features: Fighting Style: Defense (+1 AC when wearing armor)
Second Wind: Regain 1d10 + 1 HP once per short rest

personality.trait: I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
personality.ideal: Greater Good: Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others.
personality.bond: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
personality.flaw: I obey authority without question, even if I disagree.

notes: Hired by Gundren Rockseeker to escort supplies to Phandalin. Former soldier from the Neverwinter Guard.
